verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> again to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the leader <S%H5057><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> is lifted <S%H1361><s%> up And you have said, <S%H559><s%> 'I am a god, <S%H410><s%> I sit <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> In the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%> ';Yet you are a man <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> Although you make <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> like the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> –
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are wiser <S%H2450><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> Daniel; <S%H1840><s%> There is no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> secret <S%H5640><s%> that is a match <S%H6004><s%> for you.

"By your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%> You have acquired <S%H6213><s%> riches <S%H2428><s%> for yourself, And have acquired <S%H6213><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%> for your treasuries. <S%H214><s%>

"By your great <S%H7230><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> by your trade <S%H7404><s%> You have increased <S%H7235><s%> your riches, <S%H2428><s%> And your heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted <S%H1361><s%> up because of your riches <S%H2428><s%> –

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Because <S%H3282><s%> you have made <S%H5414><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> Like the heart <S%H3820><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> upon you, The most <S%H6184><s%> ruthless <S%H6184><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> And they will draw <S%H9553><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> Against <S%H5921><s%> the beauty <S%H3308><s%> of your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> And defile <S%H2490><s%> your splendor. <S%H3314><s%>

'They will bring <S%H3381><s%> you down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit, <S%H7845><s%> And you will die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4463><s%> of those who are slain <S%H2491><s%> In the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas. <S%H3220><s%>

'Will you still <S%H559><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "I am a god, <S%H430><s%>" In the presence <S%H6440><s%> of your slayer, <S%H2026><s%> Although you are a man <S%H120><s%> and not God, <S%H410><s%> In the hands <S%H3027><s%> of those who wound <S%H9135><s%> you?

'You will die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> By the hand <S%H3027><s%> of strangers, <S%H2114><s%> For I have spoken! <S%H1696><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%>"'"
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> up a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "You had the seal <S%H2856><s%> of perfection, <S%H8508><s%> Full <S%H4392><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and perfect <S%H3632><s%> in beauty. <S%H3308><s%>

"You were in Eden, <S%H5731><s%> the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> precious <S%H3368><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> was your covering: <S%H4540><s%> The ruby, <S%H124><s%> the topaz, <S%H6357><s%> and the diamond; <S%H3095><s%> The beryl, <S%H8658><s%> the onyx, <S%H7718><s%> and the jasper; <S%H3471><s%> The lapis <S%H5601><s%> lazuli, <S%H5601><s%> the turquoise, <S%H5306><s%> and the emerald; <S%H9064><s%> And the gold, <S%H2091><s%> the workmanship <S%H4399><s%> of your settings <S%H8596><s%> and sockets, <S%H5345><s%> Was in you. On the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were created <S%H1254><s%> They were prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

"You were the anointed <S%H4473><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> who covers, <S%H5526><s%> And I placed <S%H5414><s%> you [there.] You were on the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> You walked <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

"You were blameless <S%H8549><s%> in your ways <S%H1870><s%> From the day <S%H3117><s%> you were created, <S%H1254><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> unrighteousness <S%H9390><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in you.

"By the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of your trade <S%H7404><s%> You were internally <S%H8432><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence, <S%H2555><s%> And you sinned; <S%H2398><s%> Therefore I have cast <S%H2490><s%> you as profane <S%H2490><s%> From the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> And I have destroyed you, O covering <S%H6><s%> cherub, <S%H5526><s%> From the midst <S%H3742><s%> of the stones <S%H8432><s%> of fire. <S%H68><s%>

"Your heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted <S%H1361><s%> up because of your beauty; <S%H3308><s%> You corrupted <S%H7843><s%> your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> by reason <S%H5921><s%> of your splendor. <S%H3314><s%> I cast <S%H7993><s%> you to the ground; <S%H776><s%> I put <S%H5414><s%> you before <S%H6440><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> That they may see <S%H7200><s%> you.

"By the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> In the unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> of your trade, <S%H7404><s%> You profaned <S%H2490><s%> your sanctuaries. <S%H4720><s%> Therefore I have brought <S%H3318><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you; It has consumed <S%H398><s%> you, And I have turned <S%H5414><s%> you to ashes <S%H665><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> In the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> who see <S%H7200><s%> you.

"All <S%H3605><s%> who know <S%H3045><s%> you among the peoples <S%H5971><s%> Are appalled <S%H8074><s%> at you; You have become <S%H1961><s%> terrified, <S%H1091><s%> And you will be no <S%H369><s%> more <S%H369><s%>. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>"' "
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her,

and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> you, O Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> And I shall be glorified <S%H3513><s%> in your midst. <S%H8432><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in her, And I shall manifest <S%H6942><s%> My holiness <S%H6942><s%> in her.

"For I shall send <S%H7971><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%> to her And blood <S%H1818><s%> to her streets, <S%H2351><s%> And the wounded <S%H2491><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> in her midst <S%H8432><s%> By the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon her on every <S%H5439><s%> side; <S%H5439><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"And there will be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a prickling <S%H3992><s%> brier <S%H5544><s%> or a painful <S%H3510><s%> thorn <S%H6975><s%> from any <S%H3605><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> them who scorned <S%H9589><s%> them; then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "When I gather <S%H6908><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> among whom <S%H834><s%> they are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and shall manifest <S%H6942><s%> My holiness <S%H6942><s%> in them in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> then they will live <S%H3427><s%> in their land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> to My servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

"And they will live <S%H3427><s%> in it securely; <S%H983><s%> and they will build <S%H1129><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> when I execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon all <S%H3605><s%> who scorn <S%H9589><s%> them round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> them. Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>"' "
